content.rendered:
Space Available and Capacity

You can get the best price deals at WedMeGood with this wedding venue when you book any of their venues . they have 3 indoor wedding halls , each decorated to reflect the themes and colour that your wedding look aspires to have.There are 2 indoor wedding halls each with a huge capacity of 900 to 1000 guests.Additionally they have a smaller banquet hall for 250 guests.Their majestic entrance and entire facade looks breathtaking and is definitely a venue to reckon with

 

Facilities Available at Diamond Crown Banquet

Offering a spacious area for all wedding festivities they also offer in-house catering, and in house decorator. They also permit alcohol from outside, an inhouse DJ, all under one roof, perfect for your special functions.

 

Cuisines

They have their own catering facility offering delicacies that are worth every penny. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food options are offered, also allowing outside vendors. They provide inhouse alcohol as well, making them a perfect choice for your special occasion.

 

Location

This property is located in Noida, and is well equipped with facilities that redefine the comfort with elegance and efficiency. It is an easily accessible venue.

excerpt.rendered: Diamond Crown Banquets is hailed as one of the most beautiful wedding banquets in Noida. They offer more than one wedding venue giving you an option to use one or all of their wedding halls for your multiple events ranging from pre wedding , wedding rituals, post wedding reception etc. Their clients are known to live the food plated up by their in-house catering team. Diamond Crown have 3 indoor wedding halls, each decorated to reflect the themes and colour that your wedding look aspires to have.
